outputs.output_descr:
The activities within the second national communication are continuations of work initiated in the initial national communication, with the following outputs. 
Ouput 1:  An inventory of greenouse gases for the year 2000.
Output 2:  Identification of strategies and measures to abate the emission of greenhouse gases
Output 3.  An assessment of the impacts of climate change on the various economic and natural systems and relevant adaptation measures : and 
Outpout 4:  The preparation of Barbados' Second National Communication to the UNFCCC.

project_descr: PIMS 3361 CC PDF A: THE PREPARATION OF BARBADOS' SECOND NATIONAL COMMUNICATION ON CLIMATE CHANGE.
